import React, { Component } from "react"; import { MDBContainer, MDBBtn, MDBModal, MDBModalBody, MDBModalHeader, MDBModalFooter, MDBInputGroup, MDBInput, } from "mdbreact"; import { MDBCarousel, MDBCarouselInner, MDBCarouselItem, MDBView, } from "mdbreact"; import { addAideToDB } from "../actions/aideActionCreator"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; class Postuler extends Component { state = { modal14: false, }; toggle = (nr) => () => { let modalNumber = "modal" + nr; this.setState({ [modalNumber]: !this.state[modalNumber], }); }; render() { return ( carousel {/* **********modal********** */} Postuler maintenant MDBModal title this.setState({ Nom_Prénom: e.target.value })} label="Nom Prénom" outline /> this.setState({ Age: e.target.value })} label="Age" outline /> this.setState({ photo: e.target.value })} label="Photo" outline /> this.setState({ sexe: e.target.value })} containerClassName="mb-3" prepend="Sexe" inputs={ } /> this.setState({ Num: e.target.value })} label="Numéro téléphone" outline /> this.setState({ Ville: e.target.value })} label="Ville" outline /> this.setState({ dispo: e.target.value })} label="Disponibilité" outline /> this.setState({ Exp: e.target.value })} label="Expérience" outline /> Close this.props.addAide({ Nom_prénom: this.state.Nom_prénom, Age: this.state.Age, photo: this.state.photo, Ville: this.state.Ville, Exp: this.state.Exp, dispo: this.state.dispo, Num: this.state.Num, sexe: this.state.sexe, }) } > Postuler {/*************** **** card ****************/}

Card Flip with Text

Hover over the image below:

kkk

John Doe

Architect & Engineer

We love that guy

 ); } } const mapDispatchToProps = (dispatch) => { return { addAide: (el) => dispatch(addAideToDB(el)), }; }; export default connect(null, mapDispatchToProps)(Postuler);
